channel.title: Projects on favstats - personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on favstats - personal blog

item.title: Slides: Hacking Germany’s Official Statistics with datenguideR
item.description: These slides were presented at the berlinR Meetup group.

item.title: Slides: Package Development in R
item.description: These slides were presented at the Kickoff workshop for the Datenguide project (organized by Correlaid).

item.title: Slides: Personalisation Algorithms and Extremist Content Online
item.description: These slides were presented at the Terrorism and Social Media Conference 2019 at Swansea University.

item.title: Blog Post: Retaliatory Tariffs and Trump’s Base
item.description: A blog post for Data for Progress analyzing how retaliatory tariffs are hurting Trump’s base specifically.

item.title: Visualizing Gas Explosions in Lawrence, MA
item.description: This is a little project where I visualize the gas explosions that rocked Lawrence, MA on 13th September 2018.

item.title: Slides: Deliberation Across the World
item.description: These slides were presented at the WAPOR general conference in June 2018. The paper investigates the effect of deliberative quality of a political system on regime legitimacy in 119 countries and received the best student paper award (Naomi C. Turner Prize) at the WAPOR 2018 general conference.

item.title: Slides: Godly Governance
item.description: These slides were presented at the WAPOR general conference in June 2018. The paper investigates the role of religiosity in supporting religious governance in the MENA region.

item.title: Slides: Variants of Populism
item.description: These slides were presented at the Politicologenetmaal conference in June 2018. This research is about the support for populism in Europe.

item.title: Slides: Decoding the Alt-Right
item.description: These slides were presented at a VOX-Pol counter-extremism workshop in May 2018. The research project is about tracking the Alt-Right and its spread into mainstream media.

item.title: LearnR - Modelldiagnostik
item.description: Die Modelldiagnostik dient dazu die Validität und Reliabilität der Ergebnisse einer linearen Regression sicherzustellen. In diesem Workshop lernt ihr die Grundkonzepte, deren Anwendung sowie Interpretation und Visualisierung.
